tns:patch.author: gkvizhinadze
tns:patch.description: regional funding processing. Set initial value for new "nonnull" field is_regional_funding

script.lang: INSERT INTO amp_global_settings(id, settingsname, settingsvalue, possiblevalues, description, section) values (nextval('amp_global_settings_seq'), 'Show all countries','false','t_Boolean','Show all countries with regions set-up in filters','general');
